properties.name: security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used to generate the JWT autentication tokens.

properties.name: security.jwt.expiration-time
properties.description: The expiration time for a JWT authentication token in milliseconds.

properties.name: security.jwt.refresh-expiration-time
properties.description: The espiration time for a JWT refresh token in milliseconds.

properties.name: application.users.admin.username
properties.description: The default admin username. Will be created if no admin in repository.

properties.name: application.users.admin.password
properties.description: The password for default admin user.
